docs.snippet: The discovery of the Americas set off a European expansion that has continued unabated for five centuries. With the beginning of planetary (transoceanic) empires, Europe swiftly rewrote its own mythology of world history; the balance remains...
docs.lead_paragraph: The discovery of the Americas set off a European expansion that has continued unabated for five centuries. With the beginning of planetary (transoceanic) empires, Europe swiftly rewrote its own mythology of world history; the balance remains substantially unredressed.
